config.name: Environment ID
config.hint: Can be found in the Setup Checklist in the Formbricks Settings

config.name: Formbricks API Key
config.hint: You can generate a new API Key in the Formbricks Settings

config.name: Enable Import
config.hint: Do you want to import display events and responses from Formbricks?

config.name: Enable Export
config.hint: Do you want to send Posthog users and their attributes to Formbricks?

config.name: Reset
config.hint: **Advanced** - Reset the plugin's storage. This will catch up all events from the beginning of time.
